title: Exploring Effective Instructional Design Strategies for Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Language Proficiency and Competency in Digital Device Usage
context.additional_context: Short-term intensive language proficiency improvement program for corporate settings, offering 15-minute daily microlearning modules via mobile devices

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the effectiveness of instructional design strategies with over 80% accuracy through experimental comparative research design.
Learners can explain the operational mechanisms of instructional strategies using mediator/moderator variable analysis.
Learners can develop language learning modules applying effective instructional design strategies in mobile learning environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
